subject: Re: [junit] nightly build feature
msgSnippet: Kshitija, That s an excellent thing to do.  Google for continuous integration : popular tools include Cruise Control and Continuum.  Good luck, David Saff
messageBody:
Kshitija,

That's an excellent thing to do. Google for "continuous integration": popular tools include Cruise Control and Continuum. Good luck,

David Saff


akshitija wrote:
> Does Junit has any feature called nightly build feature ? Which will
> run everynight & will identify the issues if any from newly developed
> code?
> If not then is there a way to achieve this?
> Thanks
> Kshitija
